Key Match Events: The Mavericks broke the game open in the fourth quarter by unleashing a demoralizing 19-5 run in the first four minutes.
Victor Wembanyama struggled with 4 turnovers and 1-for-4 long-range shots in the third frame.
Dallas' physicality was a key reason in Victor Wembanyama's rough-shooting night.
Pre-Game Insights: Victor Wembanyama reportedly added 25 pounds of muscle leading into the 2024-25 campaign.
Post-Match Reflections: Victor Wembanyama and the starters helplessly watched from the bench as Dallas cruised to a 120-109 win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Victor Wembanyama tallied six points, four rebounds, one assist, one block in 14 minutes.
Dereck Lively II finished with six points, five rebounds, one steal and one block.
Others: The Mavericks' defense didn't start when Victor Wembanyama had the ball, making him work hard to get to his spots and crowding him whenever they could.
